sentences.sContent: I don’t doubt her sincerity, but I think she’s got her facts wrong.
sentences.sCn: 我不怀疑她的诚意，但我认为她没弄清楚事实。

sentences.sContent: May I say in all sincerity that we could not have achieved this much without your help and support.
sentences.sCn: 请允许我真心诚意地说: 没有你们的帮助和支持，我们就不可能取得这样的成绩。

sentences.sContent: ...it is advisable for people to open their mind and treat others with sincerity and warmth...
...sincerity and efforts more than a name...

trans.tranOther: when someone is sincere and really means what they are saying
